and now explaination:
Code:

{

	toY = YYYY;
}

XXXX = x Cord
YYYY = y Cord
IIII = Object Id.[/quote]

item.title: Adding portal
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“shamu308, post:5, topic:311284”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=407727.msg3011004#msg3011004 date=1256770663]
your not learning by me giving you the case.

look for some basic tuts on rune s3v3r or here…

you can atleast give us what you think it should look like then we can actually modify it till its correct.
[/quote]
i do all u said but it said when i compile illegal hail and ect.[/quote]

add the void with your other voids and the command with your other commands, it isnt difficult seriously -.- and i hope to not see any other requests on how to make more portals n shit.

this is delta btw:

case ####: ToX = ####; ToY = ####; sM("txt here."); break;

if that doesnt work then:

case ####: c.triggerTele(####, ####, 0); sM("txt here."); break;

im not entirly sure about portals on delta as i dont use them.

Read full topic
